description:
This gentleman took it upon himself to prove the facts behind wearing facemasks. He didn’t think many people would see it but I think millions are going to see this video. So whoever you are sir, thank you.

For those who saw the infographic on the dangers of wearing a facemask posted by @drashton_ , you may have noticed Instagram “fact checked” her and censored that post. And she has been attacked by trolls. Let’s show @drashton_ support for having the courage and integrity to state the truth despite the troll attacks by so called “doctors” hiding behind aliases. “Fact checked” = Paid person who sold their soul to the devil and censor FACTS and TRUTH so as to Intentionally mislead those who are uncertain with the subversive agenda to propagate ignorance, hate, division and fear.

So now, what are the trolls going to say? Challenge our vision? That what we see in this video doesn’t really exist? How stupid are these trolls?

As far as any physician, who is actually able to verify they are a real doctor with a real name, i’ll be happy to publicly debate you on this issue and prove to the world what an imbecile you are for condoning wearing a facemask. I honestly had no idea there were so many people that lacked integrity on our planet.

#covid19 #covidconspiracy #corona #patriots #patriot #patriotic #patrioticnation #DrButtar #AHEADMAP #AdvancedMedicine #AdvancedMedicineConference #IADFW #Fitness #Longevity #livelonger #livehealthy #power #facts #knowledge #truth #empowerment #livefree #livefreeordie #populationcontrol #whistleblower #soldiers #wechangetheworld #healthfreedom #health #freedom
